original: In a faraway land, lived a bald man who awoke abruptly one morning. Without hesitation, he rose from bed and gazed at his reflection in the mirror. Upon seeing his bald head, a smile crept upon his face, relishing in his baldness.
sampled: In a faraway land, lived a hairless man who awakened abruptly one morning. Without hesitation, he rose from bed and gazed at his reflection in the mirror. Upon seeing his bald head, a smile crept upon his face, relishing in his baldness.
